title: Ticket #6932: Job logs larger than 2GB cause job failures on 32-bit system builds
description:
When HTCondor is built on 32-bit platforms, the shadow fails when trying to open a job event log larger than 2GB. This also affects our 64-bit platforms where we offer a "small" 32-bit shadow.

The job becomes held with the following log event: 

012 (003.000.000) 02/25 16:03:32 Job was held.
        Failed to initialize user log to /home/jfrey/test/large.log
        Code 22 Subcode 0
...

Adding O_LARGEFILE to the open() flags allows larger job event files to be written. But since the file size is queried for EVENT_LOG rotation, this is probably insufficient for a proper solution.
remarks:

We see similar failures when a daemon's debug log grows larger than 2GB.
